book.title: The White Stone
book.description: 简介： FEW Frenchmen, united in friendship, who were spending the spring in Rome, were wont to meet amid the ruins of the disinterred Forum. They were Josphin Leclerc, an Embassy Attach on leave; M. Goubin, licenci s lettres, an annotator; Nicole Langelier,...
